item.title: Krafton slams ex-Subnautica 2 execs — who now say they’re suing
item.description: Subnautica 2 has been at the center of a contentious debate between leadership at its developer Unknown Worlds and the game’s publisher, Krafton Games. At stake is a $250 million payout, promised to U
